name: Bunny Band
desc: A special W-Engine decorated with a fluffy bunny. Although it is a mere imitation of the real animal, even the fiercest of Hollow Raiders can relieve stress by petting their bunnies while taking a break, which enhances their combat performance. There are many similar models in this series of W-Engines: a portable bunny, a foldable bunny, a furless bunny... Everyone can find one they will not be able to refuse.
desc2: Equip to increase Defense Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A special W-Engine decorated with a fluffy bunny. However, it is just an imitation of the real animal.
phaseDescs: Increases Max HP by <ct color=#2BAD00>8%</ct>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>10%</ct> when they are shielded.
Increases Max HP by <ct color=#2BAD00>9.2%</ct>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>11.5%</ct> when they are shielded.
Increases Max HP by <ct color=#2BAD00>10.4%</ct>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>13%</ct> when they are shielded.
Increases Max HP by <ct color=#2BAD00>11.6%</ct>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>14.5%</ct> when they are shielded.
Increases Max HP by <ct color=#2BAD00>12.8%</ct>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <ct color=#2BAD00>16%</ct> when they are shielded.
